entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
